history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER UPMC Presby
TTS Okay, going to upmc presbyterian. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER PPG paint Serina
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh paint store - ppg paints in pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 11:34 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 24 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Penn avenue + Village of Eastside Shpg Ctr. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER Yeah.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 75 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue + Atwood Street</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 11:37am. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER repeat

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 75 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue + Atwood Street</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 11:37am. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER neck
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 4 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 200 Lothrop Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER last
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 2 of 4, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 28 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
